comments.body: Should this use `Trigger.ProcessingTime` instead of this impl class directly or do I misunderstand?

Trigger.xxx returns `Trigger`, whereas it requires `ProcessingTimeTrigger` (was requiring `ProcessingTime`). From user-facing API we avoid dealing with actual implementations via only exposing `Trigger` but internally we require actual implementations.
OK, so this 'processing time' implementation requires the concrete implementation of the trigger. If so I get it.
The `availableOffsets` seems never updated in continuous processing, maybe we should take this into consideration when report metrics.
